channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: ‘No Kings’ protests against Trump bring a street party vibe to cities nationwide
item.description: Large crowds of protesters have gathered in cities across the United for “No Kings” demonstrations against what they see a drift into authoritarianism under President Donald Trump.

item.title: How the shutdown is affecting workers, federal programs and the economy
Plan to fire artillery over a highway during Vance visit irks California’s Newsom
